document.full_text: fifa president sepp blatter warned brazil monday that they needed to speed up preparations to host the 2014 world cup, telling them the tournament was "tomorrow" and not the day after.
document.title: blatter orders brazil to speed up 2014 work
lines_and_colors: fifa president sepp blatter warned brazil monday that they needed to speed up preparations to host the 2014 world cup, telling them the tournament was "tomorrow" and not the day after.
